name: MonsterRoll
description:
Provides random encounters from your campaign table based on the number of adventurers.

Displays monster stats for each monster encountered. Define monster stats using card images or manually entered data.

Calculates rolled initiative base on encounters.

Accepts dice roll values for game masters who like to use their own dice.

Automatically calculates when additional rolls are needed due to lurker or solo encounters.

Tracks hit points throughout an encounter for each monster rolled.

Includes one default encounter table to get you started. Create your own tables. Copy from one table to another to customize your campaigns. Supports multiple selection for copy and paste. Get all of your information at the touch of the dice.

A necessary tool for every Game Master.
